title: Melatonin in sleep-aid gummies can be off by up to 350%, study finds
description: JAMA study highlights quality control issues common in dietary supplements.

title: ChatGPT now allows disabling chat history, declining training, and exporting data
description: Unsaved chats will be retained 30 days for "abuse monitoring" before permanent deletion.

title: GOP releases 100% AI-generated ad to fearmonger over Biden’s reelection bid
description: RNC calls Biden "out of touch" for asking voters to let him "finish the job!"

title: Link between herpesviruses and giant viruses no longer missing
description: Don’t be alarmed: They only infect plankton.

title: EU names 19 large tech platforms that must follow Europe’s new Internet rules
description: Rules apply to five Google sites, Facebook, Apple, Bing, Twitter, TikTok, etc.

title: Has the “Tully monster” mystery finally been solved after 75 years?
description: "Based on multiple lines of evidence, the vertebrate hypothesis of the Tully monster is untenable."

title: Zero trust for Zoom calls: ChromeOS getting universal microphone/camera toggles
description: No more guessing which web meeting apps auto-start your audio or video.

title: AMD’s Ryzen Z1 chips could power a new wave of handheld Steam Deck clones
description: The Z1-series is already coming to at least one handheld PC, the Asus ROG Ally.

title: Fossil fuel companies must face climate change lawsuits in local courts
description: Cities and states want their cases heard at the state level, not in the federal courts.

title: GM confirms Chevy Bolt will die this year, making way for electric pickups
description: GM expects to build 70,000 this year before ending one of our favorite EVs.

title: Sacklers gave $19M to National Academies amid influential pain, opioid reports
description: The National Academies said it tried to give it back but couldn't.

title: Here’s a look at Lucid’s next luxury EV, the Gravity SUV
description: Details are scarce, but the 7-seater will offer more range than other EV SUVs.

title: 33 practical gift ideas for Mother’s Day 2023
description: Thoughtful tech gifts that will delight moms this Mother's Day.
